headline: Whaley, Cranley to participate in 3 debates
author: Schalischa Petit-De
sentences: Whaley’s campaign team said, “Now that the candidate filing deadline is behind us, Nan is excited to participate in three debates with John Cranley, taking place between now and the primary election.
DAYTON, Ohio (WDTN) – Former Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley will be participating in several debates with John Cranley, the former mayor of Cincinnati.
Whaley announced her run for governor in April 2021 and Cranley announced his run in August 2021.
According to a release, the Ohio gubernatorial candidates will participate in three debates.
